content:
RegionCodeDescription Class

Definition

Represents the description associated with the region code for the Service bus.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract(Name="RegionCodeDescription", Namespace="http://schemas.microsoft.com/netservices/2010/10/servicebus/connect")]
public class RegionCodeDescription
Inheritance
Object
RegionCodeDescription
Attributes
System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract

Constructors

RegionCodeDescription()

Fields

Serializer

The serializer associated with the description.

Properties

Code

Gets or sets the code associated with this instance.
FullName

Gets or sets the full name of this instance.
